page.title: 03Great Oak Farm near Talke
page.content: On 14th May 1985 Jane,Karen,Mandy, Vanessa and Elizabeth went to visit Great Oak Farm,owned by Mr D.R.Cole.He appeared with his dogs Caesar and Holly and walked to a garden gate by the farm track to answer questions.He had 76 cattle and 14 fields.He told us about some pigs which dug up coins,every Sunday,but he has'nt any pigs now.We saw some Charolais calves about 5 weeks old.He told us about the nail makers who lived at the farmhouse.At the milking parlour he showed us a spiked piece of metal which he fixed to a cow's nose to prevent it from sucking other cow's udders.We also saw a breeding board like a circular calendar with markers to show each cow's calving time.
